DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate long term safety tolerability ALKS 3831 subject schizophrenia .
DOC.brief_title: A Long-Term Safety Tolerability Study ALKS 3831 Adults With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Subject complete 4week treatment period ( visit include end treatment visit ) antecedent study ALK3831A305 within 7 day . Agrees use acceptable method contraception duration study . Additional criterion may apply . Subject currently take medication contraindicate olanzapine use . Subject positive test drug abuse study entry . Subject pregnant , plan become pregnant , breastfeed study . Additional criterion may apply .
